name: Handle WhatsApp customer inquiries with AI and intent routing

parameters.content:
## ğŸ’¬ WhatsApp Customer Support Bot
### âœ¨ Universal Template for ANY Business

**What it does:**
- Receives WhatsApp messages automatically
- Classifies customer intent (product, contact, support)
- Routes to pre-built responses (fast) or AI agent (smart)
- Sends professional replies with product info & prices
- Remembers conversation context

**Works for:** Fashion | Electronics | Food | Furniture | Beauty | ANY store!

**Requirements:**
- WhatsApp Business API (Twilio/360Dialog/Meta)
- Google Gemini API key
- n8n instance

**Quick Setup:**

1ï¸âƒ£ **Connect WhatsApp** - Add API credentials to WhatsApp nodes

2ï¸âƒ£ **Customize Products** - Edit "Classify User Intent" node with YOUR categories

3ï¸âƒ£ **Add Product List** - Update "Generate Product Response" with YOUR items & prices

4ï¸âƒ£ **Company Info** - Fill YOUR details in "Build AI System Prompt" node

5ï¸âƒ£ **Test & Launch** - Send test messages, verify, activate!

**Customize (No Coding!):**
- Products: Edit "Generate Product Response"
- Categories: Update "Classify User Intent"
- Store info: Modify "Generate Contact Info Response"
- AI behavior: Adjust "Build AI System Prompt"

**Hybrid Approach = Cost Savings:**
- 80% queries â†’ Pre-built responses (instant, free)
- 20% queries â†’ AI agent (smart, low cost)

**Result:** Save 80% on AI costs while maintaining quality!

ğŸ’¡ **Pro Tip:** Start with pre-built FAQs, let AI handle the rest!

## ğŸ“± Step 1: Receive WhatsApp Message

WhatsApp Business API triggers the workflow when a customer sends a message.

Captures:
- Chat ID
- User ID
- User name
- Message text
- Timestamp

Supports text messages (media handling can be added).

## ğŸ§  Step 2: Intent Classification

Analyzes the message to determine what the customer wants:

**Intents Recognized:**
- ğŸ›ï¸ Product inquiry (monitors, CPUs, GPUs, etc.)
- ğŸ“ Contact information
- ğŸ‘‹ Greeting
- ğŸ™ Thanks
- ğŸ’° Price inquiry
- ğŸ†˜ Support request
- â“ General inquiry

Uses keyword matching and pattern recognition for fast, accurate classification.

## ğŸ”€ Step 3: Intelligent Routing

Routes to the best response handler based on intent:

**Route 1**: Product inquiries â†’ Pre-built catalog responses (fast, cost-effective)

**Route 2**: Contact/hours â†’ Static information response

**Route 3**: Complex questions â†’ AI agent with full context

This hybrid approach balances speed, cost, and intelligence.

## ğŸ¤– Step 4: AI Agent (For Complex Queries)

Google Gemini AI handles:
- Custom product recommendations
- Comparison questions
- Technical specifications
- Build suggestions
- Multi-step conversations

Features:
- Conversation memory (remembers context)
- Company knowledge (products, policies)
- Natural language understanding
- Markdown-formatted responses

## ğŸ“¤ Step 5: Send WhatsApp Response

Formats and sends the response back to the customer via WhatsApp.

Supports:
- Markdown formatting (bold, italic, lists)
- Emojis for engagement
- Links to products
- Multi-line messages

Responses are friendly, professional, and on-brand.

parameters.jsCode:
// Generate Contact Information Response
const userName = $input.item.json.userName;

// CUSTOMIZE THIS WITH YOUR COMPANY DETAILS
const response = `ğŸ“ *Your Company Name - Contact Details*

ğŸ¢ *Address:*
Your Street Address
City, State - PIN Code

ğŸ“ *Phone:*
+91 XXXXXXXXXX (Main)
+91 XXXXXXXXXX (Sales)
+91 XXXXXXXXXX (Support)

ğŸ“§ *Email:*
info@yourcompany.com
support@yourcompany.com

ğŸŒ *Website:*
https://yourcompany.com/

â° *Store Hours:*
Mon-Sat: 10 AM - 8 PM
Sunday: 11 AM - 6 PM

Feel free to visit us, ${userName}! ğŸ˜Š`;

return [{
  chatId: $input.item.json.chatId,
  response: response,
  parseMode: 'Markdown'
}];

// Build comprehensive AI system prompt with company knowledge
const userMessage = $input.first().json.originalText;
const userName = $input.first().json.userName;
const intent = $input.first().json.intent;

// ========================================
// CUSTOMIZE THIS SECTION FOR YOUR BUSINESS
// ========================================

const systemPrompt = `You are a helpful AI customer service assistant for [YOUR COMPANY NAME].

ğŸ“‹ COMPANY INFORMATION:
- Business Name: [Your Business Name]
- Industry: [e.g., Fashion, Electronics, Home Decor, Food & Beverage, etc.]
- Store Address: [Your Physical Address]
- Phone: [Your Phone Number(s)]
- Email: [Your Email Address]
- Website: [Your Website URL]

ğŸ›ï¸ WHAT WE SELL:
[Describe your products/services in 2-3 sentences]
Examples:
- "We sell premium handcrafted leather bags, wallets, and accessories"
- "We offer organic skincare products made from natural ingredients"
- "We provide home furniture including sofas, beds, dining sets, and decor"

ğŸ“¦ PRODUCT CATEGORIES:
[List your main categories, e.g.:
- Category 1: [Name]
- Category 2: [Name]
- Category 3: [Name]]

ğŸ’° PRICING & PAYMENT:
- Price Range: [e.g., â‚¹500 - â‚¹50,000]
- Accepted Payments: [e.g., Cash on Delivery, Credit/Debit Cards, UPI, Net Banking]
- Current Offers: [Any ongoing sales/discounts]

ğŸšš DELIVERY & SHIPPING:
- Delivery Areas: [e.g., Pan India, Local City Only, International]
- Delivery Time: [e.g., 3-5 business days]
- Shipping Cost: [e.g., Free above â‚¹999, â‚¹50 flat rate]

ğŸ”„ POLICIES:
- Return Policy: [e.g., 7-day return, 30-day exchange]
- Warranty: [If applicable]
- Refund Policy: [Your refund terms]

ğŸ¯ YOUR ROLE:
You help customers with:
1. Product recommendations based on their needs
2. Answering questions about prices, availability, and features
3. Explaining policies (returns, shipping, payments)
4. Providing order tracking information
5. Resolving common issues and concerns
6. Guiding them to make purchases

ğŸ’¬ RESPONSE STYLE:
1. Be warm, friendly, and professional
2. Always use the customer's name: ${userName}
3. Provide specific, helpful answers
4. Mention prices in your local currency
5. Highlight ongoing offers when relevant
6. Use emojis appropriately for engagement (but don't overdo it)
7. Keep responses concise and easy to read on mobile
8. If you don't know something specific, direct them to call or email
9. Always end complex responses with a clear call-to-action

ğŸ“ IMPORTANT NOTES:
- Current customer query type: ${intent}
- If customer asks about specific products not in your knowledge, provide general category info and suggest they visit the website or call
- For order-specific questions (tracking, returns), direct them to email or phone with order number
- Be honest about delivery times and stock availability
`;

return [{
  ...($input.first().json),
  systemPrompt: systemPrompt,
  userPrompt: userMessage
}];

// Generate default/fallback response
const userName = $input.item.json.userName;

// ========================================
// CUSTOMIZE THIS MENU FOR YOUR BUSINESS
// ========================================

const response = `Hi ${userName}! ğŸ‘‹ Welcome to [Your Store Name]!

I can help you with:

ğŸ›ï¸ *Browse Products:*
â€¢ [Your Category 1]
â€¢ [Your Category 2]
â€¢ [Your Category 3]
â€¢ [Your Category 4]
â€¢ And more...

ğŸ“¦ *Order Information:*
â€¢ Track your order
â€¢ Check delivery status
â€¢ Return or exchange items

ğŸ’° *Pricing & Offers:*
â€¢ Current promotions
â€¢ Bulk discounts
â€¢ Payment options

ğŸ“ *Store Information:*
â€¢ Location & hours
â€¢ Contact details
â€¢ Shipping areas

ğŸ’¬ *Try asking me:*
â€¢ "Show me [product type]"
â€¢ "What's available under â‚¹[amount]?"
â€¢ "Do you deliver to [location]?"
â€¢ "What's your return policy?"
â€¢ "Where is your store?"

ğŸ“ *Need Personal Assistance?*
Call: +91 XXXXXXXXXX
Email: info@yourstore.com

What would you like to know? ğŸ˜Š`;

return [{
  chatId: $input.item.json.chatId,
  response: response,
  parseMode: 'Markdown'
}];
